title: No bake cherry cheesecake
ingredients: ['For the digestive biscuit base', '100g digestive biscuit crumbs', '50g butter or margarine, softened', '50g caster sugar (optional)', 'For the filling', '225g cream cheese', '125g icing sugar', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '250ml double cream, whipped', '1 (400g) tin red or black cherry fruit filling']
